title: Emergency
content: I have lost my acknowledgement documents and warden is not talking further without the acknowledgement number what should I do

comments.body: If you have a Xerox of the documents, approach them with the xerox and have them search for it. Otherwise approach the higher ups. They can't deny not giving you the originals.
Theyâ€™re not responding quickly over email
Try to meet the office members (you only )since you lost the documents
